Articles.Content:
- Incoming transmission -

Something wrong at KSP...

They are not telling us what we should have the right to know... This only is the beggining... 

- End transmission -

This is my new KSP blog devoted to telling the story of my fledgling empire from the view of the KSP's PR manager. With some hints of sabotage involved things are going to get interesting quickly as my fledgling empire expands out into to Kerbol system.

[Read here.](http://www.kerbalspacecenter.WordPress.com)

I would love to see some criticism and do comment what you want to see and possibly directions for the story.

Thanks!
